purpose_text.para: Controls sample filtering by events. The overall filter is the logical AND of these filters. For example, if E[3] and E[5] are both set to 1, only samples that have both event 3 (Level 1 unified or data cache refill) and event 5 set (TLB walk) are recorded

field_description.para: E[63] is the event filter for event 63. If event 63 is not implemented, or filtering on event 63 is not supported, the corresponding bit is RAZ/WI.

field_value_description.para: Event 63 is ignored.
Do not record samples that have event 63 == 0.

field_description.para: An IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED event might be recorded as a multi-bit field. In this case, if the corresponding bits of PMSEVFR_EL1 define an IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED filter for the event.
This field is ignored by the PE when PMSFCR_EL1.FE == 0
E[62] is the event filter for event 62. If event 62 is not implemented, or filtering on event 62 is not supported, the corresponding bit is RAZ/WI.

field_value_description.para: Event 62 is ignored.

field_description.para: This bit is ignored by the PE when PMSFCR_EL1.FE == 0.
Reserved, RAZ/WI.
Level 1 data or unified cache refill.

field_value_description.para: Level 1 data or unified cache refill event is ignored.
Do not record samples that have the Level 1 data or unified cache refill event == 0.

field_description.para: This bit is ignored by the PE when PMSFCR_EL1.FE == 0.
Reserved, RAZ/WI.
Architecturally retired.
When the PE supports sampling of speculative instructions:

field_value_description.para: Architecturally retired event is ignored.
Do not record samples that have the Architecturally retired event == 0.

field_description.para: This bit is ignored by the PE when PMSFCR_EL1.FE == 0.

If the PE does not support the sampling of speculative instructions, or always discards the sample record for speculative instructions, this bit reads as an UNKNOWN value and the PE ignores its value.

field.fields_condition: When the PE supports sampling of speculative instructions

field_description.para: Reserved, UNKNOWN.
Reserved, RAZ/WI.

ps.name: MRS
MSRregister
